summary.description:
Today, cooler for the feels like temperature (down 7.5°C) and outside temperature (down 6.6°C), more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%), and drier conditions in rainfall (down 0.3 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in light levels (up 13097 lux) and cloud levels (up 645 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in light levels (up 14789 lux) and cloud levels (up 1595 m) when compared to today.

cloud levels.description:
Today’s average cloud levels is 645.4m lower than yesterday, 589.1m lower than the past week, 1595.1m lower than the past month.

The cloud levels yesterday fell between 1059m minimum and 3380m maximum, with an average of 1078.9m; weekly and monthly averages were marginally higher at 1668.0m and 2670m.
cloud levels.summary: Partial cloudiness with some periods of sun.

summary.summary: Inside; comfortable and pleasant temperatures. Outside; mild temperatures are expected. Also, neither too dry nor too humid. Possible light showers, partial cloudiness with some periods of sun, and light levels will be low during the day. Low pressure may bring unsettled weather.
